Description copied from interface: BitOutputStream
Writes only a part of a given byte.

Specified by:
writeBytePartly in interface BitOutputStream
start - The start of the byte part. start=0 means the high order bit of the byte
end - The end of the byte part. end=7 means the low order bit of the byte
